column4: does anyone have any idea why I cannot hear sound while my dvd is playing
it wont play sound for that or xmms
you can get a list with "-ao help"
yeah. that or you use "mplayer -ao <stuff>" from the commandline for testing.
I guess you have a sound demon running. esd. perhaps.
no, it is the mplayer switch...
mplayer -ao esd dvd://1 in a terminal.
or gmplayer -> settings -> soundsomething -> [x]  esdblah -> restart gmplayer :-)
gmplayer is just a graphical interface to mplayer.
they are the same thing, really.
I'd think mplayer finds it's codecs, even if upgraded.
I have no more idea, sorry. I can't imagine why esd hangs...
uninstalling hoary is much more complicated than reinstalling warty from scratch. I don't think you want that :-)
